t: Amazon Title Requirements Change 2025: What Sellers Need To Know

You can no longer include special characters like exclamation marks (!), dollar signs ($), question marks (?), underscores (_), “ampersands” (&), or directional arrows (↑)—unless those characters are part of your brand name.
